<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Inoculation](/Feats.aspx?ID=6489) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=615" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=623" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 232 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=42)

</column>

---

You have practice combating plague, and your patients are less likely to succumb to the same disease again for a time. When you successfully [Treat a Disease](/Actions.aspx?ID=2397) on someone and they fully recover from the disease, they gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against that same disease for 1 week.
